desc: Wise Owl Paint Retailer, Furniture Salve, Redesign by Prima, DIY, Painted Furniture, Custom Signs, Custom Furniture, One Hour Enamel, One Hour Ceramic Paint, Paint Party & Events, Saltwash, Wall Paint, Furniture Flip, Furniture Paint, Crafts, Home Decor, Home Renovation, Interior Design, Paint

layout.text:
We carry the most eco-friendly paint products made in the United States. Curated, Developed and Created in Michigan.
We selected the best of the best to help you create a true piece of art.
Stop by and visit us at Painted Tree Buford in booth A1 to see all our product offerings in person. We are a local small business based out of North Georgia, we love to create gorgeous pieces while saving money and reducing waste. Chris builds custom handcrafted furniture and home decor items. Wendy paints and runs the geek side of the house. We love meeting other crafter and helping your find your inner artist!
Let's create something beautiful!
